name: Facetouch HD Pro - Create funny and cool Booth pics
name_original: Facetouch HD Pro - Create funny and cool Booth pics
description:
Top 1 Overall application in 10 countries! Top 10 Overall application in 25 countries! 1000+ reviews and an average rate of 4.5 stars!! With its intuitive and easy-to-use interface, it's easy to see why Facetouch is one of the hottest apps available today.

Packed with more than 480 beautiful high quality objects, from true-to-life hats, shades, wigs, to unique fashion accessories and funny toys for kids.
Facetouch is a full digital photo booth studio at your finger tips.

Facetouch is easy. Really easy. The secret comes from its natural and intuitive design and the ability to accurately position the objects to make the pics look real.

Facetouch will also guide you through some simple steps so you can unlock hidden objects! Pay attention to the clues inside the application.

Check our Facebook website for amazing tips and inspiring samples created by our professional designers: http://www.facebook.com/facetouchapp

You can play Facetouch on Facebook too. Visit on your computer: https://www.facebook.com/appcenter/inzori_facetouch

We are not able to answer reviews, so if you have any doubts please contact us by email: facetouch@inzori.com

Features:
• Take a picture using the camera.
• Select a picture from your camera roll.
• Add as many objects as you want to your pic.
• Add a message with different fonts, size and color.
• Drag, rotate, resize and flip the objects to make them accurately fit.
• Erase the parts you don't need from the objects.
• Share your art on Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram or by eMail.

Artwork gallery:
• Hats.
･ Hats from different cultures from all around the world.
･ Famous hats from movies. Wear Freddy Krugger's hat!
･ Cops, firemen, pilots, cowboys, rangers, they are all here!

• Wigs.
･ Blond, brunette, red … violet? We have them all!
･ Rasta, 70's, Bieber's style, Elvis, afro, zombie, all you can imagine.

• Shades & Glasses.
･ Stylish, expensive, plastic, broken, 3D and even made of fruits!

• Beards & Moustaches.
･ French, British, Russian, Italian… come and check them out!
･ Van Gogh's style, Hulk Hogan's style ? We have them.

• Bijouterie.
･ Wear the most amazing necklaces, earrings and headbands.
･ Elegant, casual or original, whatever style you prefer.

• Face painting (sold separately through IAP).
･ From colourful and shiny to the darkest and frightening designs.
･ Famous predesigned paintings like The Joke from Batman, Twisty The Clown from American Horror Story and zombies from The Walking Dead.
･ From Halloween to 4th of July celebration, you'll find the right make up to wear!

• Piercings.
･ Nose, mouth, tongue, eyebrow piercings.

• Cloth.
･ Scarves, headbands, bandanas. Colorful!

• Funny stuff.
･ Plush bears, a lot.
･ Flies, birds, dolls, flowers, eye patches.
･ Braces, smoking pipes, guitars, saxos and even an angel halo.

• Bubble dialogs & Text.
･ You can add your persolized message to your pictures!
･ Different fonts, sizes and colors.

• Christmas theme pack (sold separately through IAP).
･ Santa's Hats, elf's hats, beards and xmas stuff!
･ Exclusive and unique animated objects!

• Additional hats pack (sold separately through IAP).
･ Pirate's Hats, medieval helmets, birthday party hats and so on!

• Hilarious heads pack (sold separately through IAP).
･ This pack is just lovely! Dogs, cats, cows, skulls and even an empire soldier helmet!

Some beautiful reviews from our users:

Fun App! (5-stars)
We have a lot of fun with this app, my wife and I have it. And mess with each other as well as the kids enjoy it in the car, or somewhere they need something to keep their attention

Amazing!!! (5-stars)
Facetouch is one of those apps that hard to put down once you found it , in. short you ll have hours of fun with it

The game!! (5-stars)
Is a good game I have that game in my phone, the phone of my mom and my dad phone :) I hope you have fun with this app... Peace and love
